_header: O meek Hester so mild of mind
Subjects: Virgin Mary, prayers to; prayers, to Virgin Mary
_description: James Ryman, an orison to the Virgin Mary — five quatrains (aaab) with ‘Ora pro nobis’ refrain and burden: ‘Sancta maria ora pro nobis’

CULEe112.First Lines:
O meke hester so mylde of myndeThatte hast fownde grace for alle
                    mankynde…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…So thatte for syn we be not lostOra pro
                    nobis
